gen:link.msg:message: `OperatingExpensesOther` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_OperatingExpensesOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_OperatingExpensesOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesOtherDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesOtherDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesOtherCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesOtherCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingExpensesOther` met `FunctionalOperatingCostsAllocatedMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `OperatingExpensesOther` met `OtherOperatingExpensesToBeSpecifiedMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set00')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set00 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set01')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_AedesBenchmarkBreakdownOperatingExpensesOther_Prt101VariableMembers1_Set01 return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
